page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: There are approximately 150-200 clubs although most clubs are outside our grid reference. Many residents belong to them. Examples of these are Ladybirds Social Club for young mothers with small children, Sarisbury Green's Green Theatre and business clubs, such as the Round Table. In our area, there are the first Burridge Girl Guides and the Burridge Women's Institute. Ladybirds arrange weekly meetings and some outings. Green Theatre, although amateur, is very professional, founded by Greg Lawson twenty years ago. Although men recently dominated the business scene, women have come into the picture. { COMMUNICATIONS There are six postboxes and one telephone box:most people have phones.
